import StyledTextField from './styledComponents/StyledTextField.js' import Card from '@material-ui/core/Card' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button' import Dialog from '@material-ui/core/Dialog' import DialogActions from '@material-ui/core/DialogActions' import DialogContent from '@material-ui/core/DialogContent' import DialogContentText from '@material-ui/core/DialogContentText' import DialogTitle from '@material-ui/core/DialogTitle' import Slide from '@material-ui/core/Slide' import Icon from '@material-ui/core/Icon' import IconButton from '@material-ui/core/IconButton' import { useState, forwardRef, } from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/styles' import StyledButton from './styledComponents/StyledButton.js' const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ dialog: { overflow: 'scroll', } })) const Transition = forwardRef(function Transition(props, ref) { return }) export default function AddEmployeeButton({employees, addEmployee}) { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false) const [scroll, setScroll] = useState('grid') const classes = useStyles() const handleClickOpen = (scrollType) => () => { setOpen(true) setScroll(scrollType) } const handleClose = () => { setOpen(false) } return (
add-icon

Add Employee
Save Employee
) }
